original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at 324.00/25 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 324.00/25 to the US dollar on Wednesday, from 325.25/45 on Friday, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.06.2025 closed at 13.55/65 percent from 13.50/65 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 closed at 13.75/83 percent from 13.80/90 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 closed at 13.75/85 percent from 13.75/85 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 closed at 14.05/15 percent from 14.05/15 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed at 14.10/20 percent, from 14.05/20 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2032 closed at 14.10/25 percent, from 14.10/30 percent. (Colombo/Dec27/2023)
